TASK: Build Progressive Web App (PWA) for The Hub. Requirements: manifest.json with app name/icons/theme, service worker for offline caching, push notifications for deal alerts, install prompt for Add to Home Screen, offline watchlist support. Target: Lighthouse PWA score >90. Working directory: /Users/sydneyjackson/the-hub/the-hub. Deliverables: Complete PWA implementation with manifest, service worker, notification system, install prompt component, testing guide. Timeline: 2-3 days. Make The Hub installable on mobile and desktop with full offline support!

Provide your report in the specified format.
